name: cr-nmaster
tagline: A visual task scheduler for managing and monitoring cron jobs
description: CronMaster is a self-hosted task scheduler for running cron jobs with a visual dashboard. It includes logs, scheduling UI, alerting features, and collaborative management for automated workflows.

features.title: Cron Job Management
features.description: Create, edit, and delete cron jobs using a web interface

features.title: Job Execution Monitoring
features.description: View execution status and run history for scheduled jobs

features.title: Output and Error Logs
features.description: Inspect standard output and error logs from cron executions

features.title: Manual Job Execution
features.description: Trigger scheduled jobs manually from the interface

features.title: Web-Based Administration
features.description: Manage cron schedules without editing crontab files directly
